name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.size
description: Size of the EncryptedKeyVersion cache Queue for each key

name: dfs.http.client.failover.sleep.max.millis
description:
Specify the upper bound of sleep time in milliseconds between
    retries or failovers for WebHDFS client.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
description:
Expert only. The time to wait, in milliseconds, between failover
    attempts increases exponentially as a function of the number of
    attempts made so far, with a random factor of +/- 50%. This option
    specifies the base value used in the failover calculation. The
    first failover will retry immediately. The 2nd failover attempt
    will delay at least hadoop.security.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
    milliseconds. And so on.

name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.retry.interval
description:
The maximum amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait before
     retrying job end notification. Cluster administrators can set this to
     limit how long the Application Master waits before exiting. Must be marked
     as final to prevent users from overriding this.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-threshold
description:
The count threshold for each array length so that a manager is created only after the
    allocation count exceeds the threshold. In other words, the particular array length
    is not managed until the allocation count exceeds the threshold.

name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each map task.

name: dfs.client.cached.conn.retry
description:
The number of times the HDFS client will pull a socket from the
   cache.  Once this number is exceeded, the client will try to create a new
   socket.
